Detailed Description

PatchLevelFillPattern implementation for filling at PatchLevel boundaries and interiors.

For documentation on this interface see PatchLevelFillPattern

The fill boxes will consist of the interior of the destination level as well as ghost regions lying outside of the level interior at physical and coarse-fine boundaries. Ghost regions that overlap the interiors of other boxes on the destination level will not be included.

Member Function Documentation

void SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelBorderAndInteriorFillPattern::computeFillBoxesAndNeighborhoodSets ( boost::shared_ptr< hier::BoxLevel > &  fill_box_level,
boost::shared_ptr< hier::Connector > &  dst_to_fill,
const hier::BoxLevel &  dst_box_level,
const hier::IntVector &  fill_ghost_width,
bool  data_on_patch_border 
) [virtual]

Compute the boxes to be filled and related communication data.

The computed fill_box_level will cover the ghost regions around the boxes of dst_box_level at coarse-fine and physical boundaries, as well as the interior of the boxes of dst_box_level. The width of the ghost regions will be determined by fill_ghost_width.

Parameters:
[out] fill_box_level Output BoxLevel to be filled
[out] dst_to_fill Output Connector between dst_box_level and fill_box_level
[in] dst_box_level destination level
[in] fill_ghost_width Ghost width being filled by refine schedule
[in] data_on_patch_border true if there is data living on patch borders
Precondition:
dst_box_level.getDim() == fill_ghost_width.getDim()

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.

bool SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelBorderAndInteriorFillPattern::doesSourceLevelCommunicateToDestination (  )  const [virtual]

Tell RefineSchedule to communicate data directly from source level to destination level.

RefineSchedule should attempt to fill as much of the destination level as possible from the source level at the same level of resolution for this fill pattern.

Returns:
true

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.
